trans-unit.source: Compares two objects for equivalence, ignoring the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个对象的相等性，忽略字符串大小写。

trans-unit.source: CaseInsensitiveComparer implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings.
trans-unit.target: CaseInsensitiveComparer 实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口一样支持字符串，不区分大小写比较<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>实现<xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>接口在字符串上支持不区分大小写的比较。</xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Comparer> class is the default implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and performs case-sensitive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Comparer>类是的默认实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口，并在执行区分大小写的字符串比较。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer>

trans-unit.source: The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> are required to override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface) and the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface).
trans-unit.target: 用作键，即可通过对象<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>需重写<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法 (或<xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>接口) 和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法 (或<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口)。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> might behave incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 方法或接口的实现必须处理区分大小写相同的方式;否则为<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>行为可能不正确。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: For example, when creating a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, you must use this class with the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> class or any case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在创建<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>，你必须使用与此类<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>类或任何不区分大小写<xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>实现。</xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> class using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>类使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>当前线程。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance is created using this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>使用此构造函数，创建实例<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>保存当前线程。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 比较过程使用的已保存的区域性来确定排序顺序和大小写规则;因此，字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>类使用指定<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the sort order and casing rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的比较过程<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>来确定排序顺序和大小写规则。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to use for the new <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>要用于新<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: culture is .
trans-unit.target: cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Performs a case-insensitive comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
trans-unit.target: 执行相同类型的两个对象的不区分大小写比较并返回指示一个是否小于、 等于还是大于另一个值。

trans-unit.source: If `a` and `b` are both strings, this method uses <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to compare the strings with the casing ignored; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation of either object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`a`和`b`两个字符串，此方法使用的是<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要比较的字符串大小写与忽略; 否则，它使用<xref:System.IComparable>可能是对象的实现。</xref:System.IComparable> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: That is, if `a` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, then this method returns the result of `a`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，如果`a`实现<xref:System.IComparable>，则此方法返回的结果`a`。</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: `CompareTo` (`b`); otherwise, if `b` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, then it returns the negated result of `b`.
trans-unit.target: `CompareTo`(`b`); 否则为如果`b`实现<xref:System.IComparable>，然后它返回的求反后的结果`b`。</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: `CompareTo` (`a`).
trans-unit.target: `CompareTo` (`a`).

trans-unit.source: Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: 比较`null`允许与任何类型和使用<xref:System.IComparable>.</xref:System.IComparable>时不会生成异常

trans-unit.source: When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object.
trans-unit.target: 在排序时，`null`被视为小于任何其他对象。

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of a and b, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 一个有符号的整数，指示的相对值 a 和 b下, 表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: 含义

trans-unit.source: Less than zero
trans-unit.target: 小于零

trans-unit.source: a is less than b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: a是小于 b ，带有忽略大小写。

trans-unit.source: Zero
trans-unit.target: 零

trans-unit.source: a equals b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: a等于 b ，带有忽略大小写。

trans-unit.source: Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: 大于零

trans-unit.source: a is greater than b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: a大于 b ，带有忽略大小写。

trans-unit.source: Neither a nor b implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: 既不 a 也不 b 实现接口。

trans-unit.source: -or- a and b are of different types.
trans-unit.target: -or- a and b are of different types.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>关联<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的当前线程并将始终可用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>使用无参数构造函数，创建实例<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>保存当前线程。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 比较过程使用的已保存的区域性来确定排序顺序和大小写规则;因此，字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>关联<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>当前线程。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>关联<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>以及是否始终可用。

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the sort order and casing rules.
trans-unit.target: 比较过程使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>来确定排序顺序和大小写规则。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization>命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>关联<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。
